title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new pdf emitter when set to "none"
OB: The display property of an item set to "none" does not have any effect in the new pdf emitter.
EB: The display property of an item set to "none" should hide the item in the new pdf emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the "Properties" view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to "none".
4. Verify that the label is not displayed in the new pdf emitter.
